content.rendered:
Congratulations to the Class of 2022!  We are proud of all of you and wish you all the best in your futures!

Below are the Watch and Download links from the Class of 2022 Commencement Ceremony.  Please know that these links are active for only 30 days.  Feel free to share the links and/or download a copy for later viewing.

WATCH LINK:  https://vimeo.com/722169472

DOWNLOAD LINK: https://vimeo.com/8twentyfour/download/722169472/3e1eb855e2

Also, Island Photography will email families directly regarding ordering of pictures taken at the ceremony.
